MacroOp.Name: OMNI_FW_VER_STR
MacroOp.Brief: Defines the current framework full version string.
MacroOp.Synopsis: If OMNI_NO_FW_VER is not defined, this macro will expand to the current framework version. If OMNI_FW_VER_USE_TIME is defined, the build date/time will be appeneded to the framework string.
